subject: Log4Unit and eclipse - Log4Unit instantiation failed - testShowLog4UnitNegative
msgSnippet: I ve Googled this and found nothing: I m trying to run the Log4UnitExample.java (JUnit Recipes - p. 195) from within eclipse and am failing with the error
messageBody:
I've Googled this and found nothing:

I'm trying to run the Log4UnitExample.java (JUnit Recipes - p. 195)
from within eclipse and am failing with the error below. I run this
successfully from the command line so it may be a set up issue.
Where's the best place to look ?

Thanks,

Rob Rambusch

Failure List
-----------------------------

testShowLog4UnitNegative(junit.log4j.DemoTestCase)
